content:
The March CTCFT is coming up next Monday! The exact time is 2022-03-21T13:00:00-04:00

Inside Rust post: https://blog.rust-lang.org/inside-rust/2022/03/16/CTCFT-march.html
CTCFT post with calendar links: https://rust-lang.github.io/ctcft/meetings/2022-03-21.html

https://twitter.com/RustCTCFT/status/1504087969640206336

Agenda for the next CTCFT, 2022-03-21: https://blog.rust-lang.org/inside-rust/2022/03/16/CTCFT-march.html -- featuring @RebeccaRumbul talking about the @rust_foundation!

- Rust Cross Team Collaboration Fun Times (@RustCTCFT)

Agenda:

  • (5 min) Opening remarks :wave: (@nikomatsakis)
  • (15 min) Planning for Rust 2024 (@nikomatsakis, @Josh Triplett)
  • (15 min) Rust Foundation 2022 (Rebecca Rumbul)
  • (5 min) Closing (@nikomatsakis)

https://twitter.com/RustCTCFT/status/1505949732958609409

The March CTCFT is starting in just 10 minutes! Links in the calendar: https://rust-lang.github.io/ctcft/meetings/2022-03-21.html

- Rust Cross Team Collaboration Fun Times (@RustCTCFT)
Following up on the lang roadmap discussion: if anyone would like to discuss that further, see the #t-lang/roadmap-2024 stream.
thanks for having these meetings and having them open for all - was fun to listen in!
